messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/26/2004 12:07:58 PM Eastern Standard Time,
treegoddess@... writes:
> Anyone want to contribute names of movies that show drive-in theaters
> in them?<<
I think the movie "Christine" has a drive-in scene...that's the Stephen King
story about a boy fixing up an old car and the car taking on a jealous
personality.

Nancy B.
